name: Pixel Space Battles
description:
1) Survial mode - your task is to survive as long as possible and destroy as many enemies ships as possible
2) Levels mode - your task is destroy all enemies on level(In game include 10 levels)

Controls:
"A" - to fly in left
"D" - to fly in right
"Spacebar" - to shoot
"R" - to restart
"Escape" - to exit in menu(If you play on level or in survial) or close game(If you in menu)
